pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a kernel, module, dtb, overlay (cross-)build utility for systems running Gentoo Linux on amd64/x86_64, arm, and arm64 architectures, including several Broadcom and rockchip based single board computer (SBC) boards. Those of interest may be selected with eponymous USE flags. A working template (cross-)build configuration will be installed in /etc/kernelupdate/ for each selected board. These can then be selected with # eselect kernelupdate list/set to begin a build process. The first run of kernelupdate for a new project will create a directory tree for the project, according to the .conf. The user must then provide a link from the project-root of this tree, to valid kernel sources. More information is provided at README-Instructions. This sources selection determines what constitiutes "upstream."
